text.div: This profile constrains the Claim resource so that it can serve as the RTPBC Request in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process

name: CarinRtpbcRequest
title: CARIN RTPBC Request using Claim
description: This profile constrains the Claim resource so that it can serve as the *RTPBC Request* in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process

element.label: Unique Claim Resource Identifier
element.definition: Unique Claim Resource Identifier assigned by the submitting patient application

element.label: Unique RTPBC request ID
element.definition: An identifier for each RTPBC request that is assigned by and unique to the submitter

element.label: Request status
element.definition: The status of this request (active)

element.label: Requested Service Type
element.definition: The type of service for which pricing and coverage predetermination is being requested

element.label: Processing Mode
element.definition: The mode of processing being requested of the payer/PBM

element.label: Request Patient Information
element.definition: Limited patient information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process

element.label: Patient Reference
element.definition: Reference to a Patient resource

element.label: Created DateTime
element.definition: The date and time on which this RTBPC request was created

element.label: Preferred Pharmacy
element.definition: The patient's preferred pharmacy to be considered during creation of the response

element.label: Reference to Pharmacy Organization
element.definition: Reference to an Organization resource representing the patient's preferred pharmacy

element.label: Processing priority
element.definition: The processing priority requested of the payer/PBM
element.comment: All requests are responded to in real-time, without differentiated priority levels. Value is always 'normal'

element.label: Prescription Reference
element.definition: Reference to the pertinent prescription information in a MedicationRequest resource.

element.label: Care Team
element.definition: Prescriber reference and identifier

element.label: Prescriber
element.definition: Prescriber of the item being submitted

element.label: Prescriber Reference
element.definition: Reference to a Practitioner resource that represents the prescriber

element.label: Pharmacy Coverage
element.definition: The patient's pharmacy coverage information

element.comment: A maximum of one product is submitted per request. Value is always '1'

element.label: Care Team Sequence ID Reference
element.definition: A reference to the Care Team composite in this resource that reflects the prescriber

element.label: Prescribed Product
element.definition: A product identifier for the prescribed medication. Either an NDC11 or an RxNorm code for a prescribable product (representing drug name, strength and dose form)
element.comment: Code system for RxNorm ishttp://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm   and the code system for NDC11 is * TBD*

binding.description: CARIN RTPBC prescribable product codes (NDC and RxNorm)

element.label: Product Description
element.definition: The full prescribable product name, including drug name, strength and dose form. The drug name equals the brand name if the branded product is desired

element.label: Quantity in Billing Units
element.definition: The prescribed quantity in terms of the applicable billing unit of measure

element.label: Billing unit of measure
element.definition: Pharmacy metric billing unit: GM (gram), ML (milliliter) or EA (each)

element.comment: Only one set of coverage is submitted in the request. Value is always '1'

element.label: Pharmacy Coverage Reference
element.definition: Reference to a Coverage resource containing identification of the patient's pharmacy coverage

element.label: Pharmacy Coverage Reference
element.definition: Reference to a Coverage resource containing identification of the patient's pharmacy coverage
